# The `RegBankSelect` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This pass implements the reg bank selector pass used in the GlobalISel pipeline. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::RegBankSelect</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This pass implements the reg bank selector pass used in the GlobalISel pipeline.

At the end of this pass, all register operands have been assigned

Definition at line 91 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Enumerations

### enum  {#a033277264e702883c8bbf13871247a84}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum llvm::RegBankSelect::Mode ">
List of the modes supported by the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect">RegBankSelect</a> pass.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a033277264e702883c8bbf13871247a84a764570eb91457744372935b426a1a397" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Fast">
Assign the register banks as fast as possible (default)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a033277264e702883c8bbf13871247a84a9c9b16f1f748485bf3383411cca0bfa3" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Greedy">
Greedily minimize the cost of assigning register banks
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00096">96</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Member Functions

### assignRegisterBanks() {#a6b0bf1d2a5eba4af2825113954bb846f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool RegBankSelect::assignRegisterBanks (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp; MF)</>}>
Walk through <code>MF</code> and assign a register bank to every virtual register that are still mapped to nothing.

The target needs to provide a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo">RegisterBankInfo</a> and in particular override <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/#a3f495e9cf115e5d32f21d729c46a484e">RegisterBankInfo::getInstrMapping</a>.

Simplified algo: 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#afa42d1c7970f30d2fa388d5399348001">RBI</a> = MF.subtarget.getRegBankInfo()</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#a1a75a71e05fa8fbc53f9c4437dafef20">MIRBuilder</a>.setMF(MF)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for each</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> bb in MF</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for each</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> inst in bb</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a1a75a71e05fa8fbc53f9c4437dafef20">MIRBuilder</a>.setInstr(inst)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">    MappingCosts = <a href="#afa42d1c7970f30d2fa388d5399348001">RBI</a>.getMapping(inst);</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">    Idx = findIdxOfMinCost(MappingCosts)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurRegBank = MappingCosts&#91;Idx&#93;.RegBank</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#ad8501c8e8cf2d5ffaa86880f57cd4569">MRI</a>.setRegBank(inst.getOperand(0).getReg(), CurRegBank)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for each</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> argument in inst</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CurRegBank != argument.RegBank)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">        ArgReg = argument.getReg()</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">        Tmp = <a href="#ad8501c8e8cf2d5ffaa86880f57cd4569">MRI</a>.createNewVirtual(<a href="#ad8501c8e8cf2d5ffaa86880f57cd4569">MRI</a>.getSize(ArgReg), CurRegBank)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="#a1a75a71e05fa8fbc53f9c4437dafef20">MIRBuilder</a>.buildInstr(COPY, Tmp, ArgReg)</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">        inst.getOperand(argument.getOperandNo()).setReg(Tmp)</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00671">671</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp/#l00681">681</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp">RegBankSelect.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<MemberDefinition

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> that our input is fully legal: we require the function to have the Legalized property, so it should be.

FIXME: This should be in the MachineVerifier.

</MemberDefinition>

### getAnalysisUsage() {#a9a6d36010e8ada5ee58eeda765414a89}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void RegBankSelect::getAnalysisUsage (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysisusage">AnalysisUsage</a> &amp; AU) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
getAnalysisUsage - Subclasses that override getAnalysisUsage must call this.

For MachineFunctionPasses, calling AU.preservesCFG() indicates that the pass does not modify the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> CFG.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00624">624</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp/#l00098">98</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp">RegBankSelect.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### computeMapping() {#ac7d08af4bb81846173b6186f568fcc8b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>RegBankSelect::MappingCost RegBankSelect::computeMapping (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/registerbankinfo/instructionmapping">RegisterBankInfo::InstructionMapping</a> &amp; InstrMapping, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement">RepairingPlacement</a> &gt; &amp; RepairPts, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/mappingcost">MappingCost</a> &#42; BestCost=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Compute the cost of mapping <code>MI</code> with <code>InstrMapping</code> and compute the repairing placement for such mapping in <code>RepairPts</code>.

<code>BestCost</code> is used to specify when the cost becomes too high and thus it is not worth computing the RepairPts. Moreover if <code>BestCost</code> == nullptr, the mapping cost is actually not computed.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00593">593</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp/#l00443">443</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp">RegBankSelect.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### getRepairCost() {#ac3cfa17f907e7258d898433ddfeb3fbf}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint64&#95;t RegBankSelect::getRepairCost (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp; MO, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerbankinfo/valuemapping">RegisterBankInfo::ValueMapping</a> &amp; ValMapping) const</>}

### repairReg() {#ac8d8bb4999d968e0efc9555c2b178a83}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool RegBankSelect::repairReg (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp; MO, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerbankinfo/valuemapping">RegisterBankInfo::ValueMapping</a> &amp; ValMapping, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement">RegBankSelect::RepairingPlacement</a> &amp; RepairPt, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/iterator-range">iterator&#95;range</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> &gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">::const&#95;iterator</a> &gt; &amp; NewVRegs)</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Insert repairing code for <code>Reg</code> as specified by <code>ValMapping</code>.

The repairing placement is specified by <code>RepairPt</code>. <code>NewVRegs</code> contains all the registers required to remap <code>Reg</code>. In other words, the number of registers in NewVRegs must be equal to ValMapping.BreakDown.size().

The transformation could be sketched as: 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">... = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbittracker-cpp/#a0ee73ba17c3a2cb54752905e99d77357">op</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a></span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
 Becomes 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">&lt;NewRegs&gt; = COPY or <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/loopextractor-cpp/#a84dff14934298a71113ab11312c243f6">extract</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a></span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">... = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbittracker-cpp/#a0ee73ba17c3a2cb54752905e99d77357">op</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a></span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>


and 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbittracker-cpp/#a0ee73ba17c3a2cb54752905e99d77357">op</a> ...</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
 Becomes 
<ProgramListing>

<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbittracker-cpp/#a0ee73ba17c3a2cb54752905e99d77357">op</a> ...</span></CodeLine>
<CodeLine><span class="doxyHighlight">Reg = COPY or build&#95;sequence &lt;NewRegs&gt;</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>



<SectionUser title="Precondition">
NewVRegs.size() == ValMapping.BreakDown.size()
</SectionUser>


:::info
The caller is supposed to do the rewriting of op if need be. I.e., Reg = op ... =&gt; &lt;NewRegs&gt; = NewOp ...
:::


<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if the repairing worked, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00563">563</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp/#l00133">133</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp">RegBankSelect.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### tryAvoidingSplit() {#a781bc33cca080506ba19a20d66c1c255}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void RegBankSelect::tryAvoidingSplit (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regbankselect/repairingplacement">RegBankSelect::RepairingPlacement</a> &amp; RepairPt, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp; MO, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registerbankinfo/valuemapping">RegisterBankInfo::ValueMapping</a> &amp; ValMapping) const</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
When <code>RepairPt</code> involves splitting to repair <code>MO</code> for the given <code>ValMapping</code>, try to change the way we repair such that the splitting is not required anymore.

<SectionUser title="Precondition">
<code>RepairPt.hasSplit()</code>
</SectionUser>


<SectionUser title="Precondition">
<code>MO</code> == MO.getParent()-&gt;getOperand(<code>RepairPt.getOpIdx()</code>)
</SectionUser>


<SectionUser title="Precondition">
<code>ValMapping</code> is the mapping of <code>MO</code> for MO.getParent() that implied <code>RepairPt</code>.
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h/#l00606">606</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-h">RegBankSelect.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp/#l00323">323</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/regbankselect-cpp">RegBankSelect.cpp</a>.
